name: Careful Crystal Ballet
description:
A shmup platformer made for the first ever public Miz Jam in recorded history.

I'm...not particularly proud of this game, actually, what with it feeling like another one of those hyper-casual mobile games that clog up my iPad* and all that. But I'm lazy and didn't bother to work on something else that would've been better.

Hopefully you enjoy this little game nonetheless.

A and D to move
Mouse to aim and shoot
Collect crystals to jump
Don't fall into space lava

*The limited iOS makes me want a Surface, but alas, currency must be exchanged for goods and services.
